navigation.surveysDesc: View and participate in available surveys

notifications.title: Notifications
notifications.noNotificationsDesc: You're all caught up! No new notifications.

welcome.heroDescription: Experience the next generation of secure cloud systems designed for military excellence and strategic operations. Our platform delivers unmatched security, real-time intelligence, and seamless collaboration capabilities for defense organizations worldwide.
welcome.servicesSubtitle: Comprehensive solutions designed to meet your business needs

security.title: Security
security.description: Protect your sensitive data with military grade encryption, role based access controls and audit logs all hosted in your own private cloud.

fastUpload.title: Fast Upload Files
fastUpload.description: Leverage optimized transfer protocols and parallel streams for lightning fast uploads, even on high latency or low bandwidth networks.

easyShare.title: Easy Share Big Files
easyShare.description: Seamlessly share files of any size within your organization—no third party limits—with granular permissions and real time notifications.

dataManagement.title: Data Management
dataManagement.description: Organize and manage your files with advanced categorization, tagging, and search capabilities powered by AI-driven insights.

realTimeSync.title: Real-time Sync
realTimeSync.description: Keep your files synchronized across all devices and platforms with automatic conflict resolution and version control.

analytics.title: Analytics & Insights
analytics.description: Monitor file usage, access patterns, and storage metrics with comprehensive analytics and detailed reporting dashboards.

news1.title: Enhanced Encryption Protocol Deployed
news1.excerpt: Our latest security update introduces military-grade quantum encryption protocols, ensuring unprecedented data protection for all defense communications.

news2.title: Real-Time Intelligence Dashboard Released
news2.excerpt: Access critical intelligence data through our new real-time dashboard, featuring advanced analytics and predictive modeling capabilities.

news3.title: Global Infrastructure Expansion
news3.excerpt: WeaponpowerCloud now operates across 15 secure data centers worldwide, providing faster access and improved redundancy for mission-critical operations.

security.title: More Security
security.description: Advanced military-grade encryption and multi-layer security protocols protect your most sensitive data with quantum-resistant algorithms and zero-trust architecture.

sharing.title: Easy to Share
sharing.description: Seamlessly collaborate with authorized personnel through secure channels, encrypted communications, and granular permission controls designed for defense operations.

upload.title: Upload Large Files Fast
upload.description: Transfer massive datasets, intelligence reports, and tactical documents at lightning speed with our optimized compression and parallel upload technology.

slide1.title: Stealth fighter jet pilot forced to eject as $100M aircraft crashes in rural California

slide2.title: Breaking: Major tech company announces revolutionary AI breakthrough

slide3.title: Climate summit reaches historic agreement on global carbon reduction

card1.title: Neighbor Grew Concerned by Teens at Church Next Door, Then First Responder...

errors.durationRange: Display duration must be between 3 and 30 seconds

survey.title: Survey Management
survey.subtitle: Create, manage, and analyze surveys for your organization

list.title: Surveys
list.noSurveys: No surveys found. Create your first survey!

shared.title: Shared Surveys
shared.subtitle: Surveys shared with you by other users

search.emptyState: No surveys have been shared with you yet

auth.welcomeText: We appreciate your time and valuable feedback. Your responses will help us improve our services and create a better experience for everyone. The survey is easy and quick, and all your answers are kept completely confidential.
auth.pleaseAnswer: Please answer the following questions carefully

errors.accessDenied: You don't have permission to access this survey
errors.authenticationRequired: Authentication required to access this survey

form.title: Survey Title
form.schedulingDescription: Control when your survey is active
form.startDateHelp: Survey will start at this date/time. Leave empty to start immediately.
form.endDateHelp: Survey will stop accepting responses after this date/time. Leave empty to run indefinitely.
form.allowAnonymousDescription: Respondents don't need to sign in
form.requireCompletionDescription: All required questions must be answered

visibility.publicDescription: Anyone with the link can access

questions.title: Questions
questions.noQuestions: No questions added yet. Add your first question!

placeholders.longText: Enter your detailed answer here... You can write multiple lines

success.title: Thank you for your participation!
success.message: Your responses have been submitted successfully. We appreciate your time and feedback.

analytics.title: Survey Analytics
analytics.noDataDescription: There is no data available for this survey yet. Check back once responses are submitted.

sharing.title: Share Survey
sharing.emailPlaceholder: Enter email addresses separated by commas

confirmations.activate: Are you sure you want to activate {count} surveys?
confirmations.deactivate: Are you sure you want to deactivate {count} surveys?
confirmations.lock: Are you sure you want to lock {count} surveys?
confirmations.unlock: Are you sure you want to unlock {count} surveys?
confirmations.delete: Are you sure you want to delete {count} surveys? This action cannot be undone.

responses.title: Survey Responses
responses.noResponsesDescription: This survey hasn't received any responses yet. Share it to start collecting responses.

exportOptions.csvDescription: Export responses as a CSV file for spreadsheet analysis
exportOptions.jsonDescription: Export responses as JSON data for API integration

clone.title: Clone Survey
clone.description: Create a copy of this survey

errors.titleTooLong: Title must be less than 200 characters
errors.descriptionTooLong: Description must be less than 1000 characters
errors.questionTextTooLong: Question text must be less than 500 characters
errors.optionsRequired: Options are required for choice questions
errors.optionsMinimum: Choice questions must have at least 2 options
errors.invalidOptions: Options must be a valid JSON array
errors.unauthorized: You don't have permission to perform this action
errors.networkError: Network error. Please check your connection.
errors.serverError: Server error. Please try again later.

access.title: Access Management

private.title: Private
private.description: Only owner and invited people can access

access.confirmRegenerateLink: Are you sure you want to regenerate the link?
access.confirmRevokeLink: Are you sure you want to revoke the link?

confirmations.deleteSurvey: Are you sure you want to delete this survey? This action cannot be undone.
confirmations.deleteQuestion: Are you sure you want to delete this question?
confirmations.lockSurvey: Are you sure you want to lock this survey? Locked surveys cannot be modified.
confirmations.deactivateSurvey: Are you sure you want to deactivate this survey? It will stop accepting responses.
confirmations.unsavedChanges: You have unsaved changes. Are you sure you want to leave?

validation.titleMinLength: Title must be at least 3 characters
validation.titleMaxLength: Title must be less than 200 characters
validation.descriptionMaxLength: Description must be less than 1000 characters
validation.questionTextMinLength: Question text must be at least 3 characters
validation.questionTextMaxLength: Question text must be less than 500 characters
validation.optionMinLength: Option must be at least 1 character
validation.optionMaxLength: Option must be less than 100 characters
validation.emailFormat: Please enter a valid email address
validation.dateRange: End date must be after start date

validation.answerRequired: Please answer this question to continue
validation.titleTooLong: Survey title must be less than 200 characters
validation.descriptionTooLong: Survey description must be less than 1000 characters

files.dragDropFiles: Drag and drop files here or click to select

previewFeature.notSupported: Preview not supported for this file type

error.inactiveSurvey: This survey is no longer active

userManagement.title: User Management
userManagement.subtitle: Manage users and groups in your organization

users.title: Users
users.headerSubtitle: Review every user, add new members, and edit their permissions with ease.

groups.title: Groups
groups.headerSubtitle: Organise teams, assign members, and track group activity in one place.

password.minLength: Password must be at least 8 characters long
password.notCommon: Must not be a common password
password.notSimilar: Must not be similar to your personal information
password.tooSimilar: Password is too similar to your personal information

delete.subtitle: Are you sure you want to delete this user?
Are you sure you want to delete this group?

confirm.title: Confirm Bulk User Deletion
confirm.text: Are you sure you want to delete the selected users? This action cannot be undone.
confirm.largeBatchWarning: You are about to delete {{count}} users. This is a large batch operation. Are you sure you want to continue?

success.title: Users Deleted Successfully
success.text: {{success}} out of {{total}} users were deleted successfully.

partial.title: Partial Success
partial.text: {{success}} out of {{total}} users were deleted. {{failed}} users could not be deleted.

texts.cannotDeleteCurrentUserDesc: You cannot delete your own account while logged in.
texts.cannotDeleteLastSuperAdminDesc: The last super administrator cannot be deleted to maintain system security.
texts.noUsersDeleted: No users were deleted due to validation errors.

unauthorized.title: Unauthorized
unauthorized.text: You don't have permission to perform this operation.

forbidden.title: Access Denied
forbidden.text: You don't have sufficient privileges to delete these users.

serverError.title: Server Error
serverError.text: An error occurred while processing your request. Please try again later.

confirm.title: Confirm User Deletion
confirm.text: Are you sure you want to delete the user '{{email}}'? This action cannot be undone.

success.title: User Deleted Successfully
success.text: The user '{{email}}' has been deleted successfully.

error.title: Failed to Delete User
error.text: An error occurred while deleting the user. Please try again later.

success.title: Password Reset Successfully
success.text: The password for user '{{email}}' has been reset successfully.

error.title: Failed to Reset Password
error.text: An error occurred while resetting the user's password. Please try again later.
error.userNotFound: User not found or does not exist.

forbidden.title: Permission Denied
forbidden.text: You don't have permission to reset this user's password.
